    • Method Detail

      • getConnection

        public HttpURLConnection getConnection(Context context,
                              String feedUrl)
                                throws IOException
        Returns a HTTP connection to the provided RSS feed.
        Parameters:
        context - Context of the caller.
        feedUrl - String representing the URL of the RSS feed.
        Returns:
        HttpURLConnection connected to the provided RSS feed.
        Throws:
        IOException - thrown if network access is not available.
        See Also:
        HttpURLConnection
